abstract: French telecommunications firm Orange reaches agreement allowing termination of liceensing deal with Israeli mobile service provider Partner Communications; possible withdrawal of brand from Israel's cellular market caused diplomatic furor.
lead_paragraph: The agreement comes after an Orange executive’s comments about wanting to get out of Israel’s cellular market caused a diplomatic storm.

headline.main: French Telecom Company Orange in Deal That Lets It Part With Israeli Provider
headline.print_headline: Telecom Deal With Provider in Israel Lets Them Split

snippet: The agreement comes after an Orange executive’s comments about wanting to get out of Israel’s cellular market caused a diplomatic storm.
